Food Menu

Blueberry Chiffon Mini Pies

These pretty pre-portioned pies are sure to dazzle party guests. A cheese-and-whipped cream combo stars in the creamy filling.

Price: ₹ 250

Peaches And Cream Icebox Pies

If you're hosting during higher temperatures, you're not likely to fire up the oven for dessert. That's why these no-bake icebox pies are the perfect summer party treat.

Price: ₹ 250

Honeybee Cupcakes

If you couldn't guess from the name, honey is the star ingredient in these beautiful cupcakes. For an even more beautiful presentation, add a drizzle of honey and an edible flower.

Price: ₹ 250

Mini Strawberry Tarts

These sweet treats start with a pistachio crust. A dreamy mixture of cream cheese, lemon juice and zest, and whipped cream is folded together before filling the individual tarts.

Price: ₹ 250
